summary: This bill, the "Protecting Life in Health Savings Accounts Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the use of Health Savings Accounts (HSAs), Archer MSAs, health flexible spending arrangements, health reimbursement arrangements, and retiree health accounts for abortions, except in cases of rape, incest, or when the woman's life is endangered. The amendments apply to amounts paid with respect to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025 (and to expenses incurred with respect to the same start year for reimbursements).
